summary: An idle part-time college lecturer is annoyed by the yapping sound of a nearby dog. He decides to take drastic action.
cast: Sung-Jae Lee|Bae Doona|Ho-jung Kim|Byun Hee-Bong|Su-hee Go|Roe-ha Kim|Gin-goo Kim|Sang-soo Im|Jeong-seon Seong|Jae-ha Jo|Chae-rin Hwang|Sookyung Lee|Hyuk-Poon Kwon|Yeongi Lee|Yong-ok Kim|Se-Geum Oh|Seong-hae Kang|Jin-won Lee
title: Perro ladrador, poco mordedor
